attributes.action: Keep State Pension Triple lock protection.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK has one of the lowest pensions in Europe, and after paying taxes up until the now increased state pension, the least the government can do is keep the triple lock or bring the UK pensions in line with other countries ie: Germany and France. 

This will affect everyone that reaches State Pension age, either now or in the future.
attributes.background: Keep the State Pension triple lock protection, that was in the government's manifesto
